member.name: M:SimpleFileLogging.SimpleFileLogger.LogError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs exception details to error log file.

member.name: M:SimpleFileLogging.SimpleFileLogger.LogError(System.String[])
member.summary: Log Messages to error log files.

member.name: M:SimpleFileLogging.SimpleFileLogger.Info(System.String[])
member.summary: Logs info to info log file.

member.name: M:SimpleFileLogging.SimpleFileLogger.Info(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Logs info dictionary to log file.

member.name: M:SimpleFileLogging.SimpleFileLogger.Debug(System.String[])
member.summary: Logs debug info to debug log file.

member.name: M:SimpleFileLogging.SimpleFileLogger.Debug(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Logs debug info dictionary to debug log file.

member.name: P:SimpleFileLogging.SimpleFileLogOptions.EnableMethodGrouping
member.summary: Enables Method Grouping if it is true AssemblyFolder\ClassName\MethodName\Error-Info-Debug\logfile. else AssemblyFolder\Error-Info-Debug\ClassName\MethodName\logfile.
